MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterObjectBound (object punk);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterObjectBound(object punk) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterObjectBound (punk As Object)
public: void RegisterObjectBound(System::Object ^ punk);

span.span: The object to register for release.

summary.span: 將傳遞的物件登錄為在 Moniker 作業中被繫結而且應該在作業完成時釋放的物件。

span.span: Register the passed object as one of the objects that has been bound during a moniker operation and which should be released when it is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound`MSDN library 中。For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound` in the MSDN library.

span.span: The name to register punk with.
The object to register.

summary.span: 將指定的物件指標登錄在物件指標之內部維護表格中的指定名稱下。

span.span: Register the given object pointer under the specified name in the internally-maintained table of object pointers.

public: void RevokeObjectBound(System::Object ^ punk);

MemberSignature.Value: public void RevokeObjectParam (string pszKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RevokeObjectParam(string pszKey) cil managed
Public Sub RevokeObjectParam (pszKey As String)
public: void RevokeObjectParam(System::String ^ pszKey);

span.span: The key to unregister.

summary.span: 如果任何在內容物件參數之內部維護表格中的機碼目前已登錄的話，撤銷目前在這個機碼之下找到的物件登錄。

span.span: Revoke the registration of the object currently found under this key in the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters, if any such key is currently registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam`MSDN library 中。For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBindOptions (ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.BIND_OPTS pbindopts);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetBindOptions([in]valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.BIND_OPTS& pbindopts) cil managed
Public Sub SetBindOptions (ByRef pbindopts As BIND_OPTS)
public: void SetBindOptions(System::Runtime::InteropServices::BIND_OPTS % pbindopts);

param.name: pbindopts
param.span: 結構含有要設定的繫結選項。

span.span: The structure containing the binding options to set.

summary.span: 將一組參數儲存在繫結內容中，這些參數會使用這個繫結內容套用至稍後的 作業。

span.span: Store in the bind context a block of parameters that will apply to later operations using this bind context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IBindCtx::SetBindOptions`MSDN library 中。For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::SetBindOptions` in the MSDN library.
